description:
For the following bug fix, we introduced a broken fix:
1284596

We see errors like this in the log:
['XENAPI_PLUGIN_FAILURE', 'upload_vhd', 'TypeError', 'sequence item 2: expected string, int found']
title: xenapi: errors when trying to kill tar process
